page.topic: I Forgot My Password. What Should I Do?
page.description: You can reset your password for both the TransForm Mobile Application and TransForm Central online.

description.p: Your Alpha TransForm password can be reset at *[extlink:transform.alphasoftware.com@https://transform.alphasoftware.com]*.
Go to *[extlink:TransForm Central@https://transform.alphasoftware.com]*. Click the *[ui:logout]* button if you are already logged in.
Next, click the *[ui:Forgot Your Password Link]*.
Follow the instructions to reset your password. The new password is used by both TransForm Central and the TransForm mobile application.
If you require additional assistance, contact [Alpha TransForm Support] by sending an email to tfservice@alphasoftware.com.
